app.description:
Learning Kashmir Shaivism is a dedicated app for studying the non-dual tantric tradition of Kashmir Shaivism.

Explore the four Upāyas (paths), the 36 Tattvas, Sanskrit fundamentals, and advanced philosophical concepts through interactive quizzes and structured learning units.

Part of the PlainOS movement — clean, fast, and focused on your spiritual growth. No ads, no tracking, no noise.

Features:
• Comprehensive coverage of Āṇavopāya, Śāktopāya, Śāmbhavopāya, and Anupāya
• 36 Tattvas explained in detail
• Sanskrit terminology and etymology
• Progress tracking for your learning journey
• Offline access to all content
• Clean, distraction-free interface
